Project Description
Human resource management (or simply HRM)

Idea is to build end to end, cost effective, robust, state-of-art, best-in-class disaster recovery management application with to support organization operation which includes

Request for new Resource, Pre-Scanning module, Interview Module, Employee Documentation Management module, Leave management, Salary, Insurance, Salary appraisals, Achievement Awards, Attendance tracking. Project Management, Create and Manage Project, Mange Department, Allocation-DeAllocation of resource.

The modules covered in this application are
1. Employee Management
2. Profile Management
3. Attendance Management
4. Training Management
5. Award
6. Conference Hall
7. History - Log
8. Timesheet or TimeLog
9. Reporting
10. Outlook Address book Integration

Module Stats.
